properties.name: zblog.base.header.sysCode
properties.description: Caller system code.

properties.name: zblog.base.header.appCode
properties.description: Caller application code.

properties.name: zblog.base.header.deploy.deployArea
properties.description: Deployment region.

properties.name: zblog.base.header.deploy.deployCenter
properties.description: Deployment center/room.

properties.name: zblog.base.header.deploy.deployIp
properties.description: Deployment server address.

properties.name: zblog.base.header.deploy.deployUnit
properties.description: Deployment unit.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.cacheTtl
properties.description: 缓存刷新周期，单位毫秒，默认 60 分钟.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.loadSql
properties.description: 从数据库加载国际化数据的 SQL 语句.
properties.defaultValue: SELECT code, locale, message FROM i18n_message

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.codeColumn
properties.description: 数据库中 code 列名.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.localeColumn
properties.description: 数据库中 locale（语言）列名.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.messageColumn
properties.description: 数据库中 message（消息内容）列名.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.encode
properties.description: 国际化文件的编码方式，默认 UTF-8.

properties.name: zblog.base.i18n.basenames
properties.description: 本地资源文件的基础名列表（无扩展名）.

properties.name: zblog.base.seq.datacenterId
properties.description: 数据中心ID.

properties.name: zblog.base.seq.machineId
properties.description: 机器ID.

properties.name: zblog.base.cache.type
properties.description: 系统缓存类型.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.login-url
properties.description: 登录 URL.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.logout-url
properties.description: 登出 URL.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.password-limited-day
properties.description: 密码有效天数，默认 90 天.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.resource-roles-cache-mills
properties.description: 资源与角色关联关系的缓存时长, 单位毫秒, 默认 30 分钟.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.sso-token-cache-mills
properties.description: SSO 令牌缓存时长, 单位毫秒, 默认 3 天.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.password-history-count
properties.description: 新密码不能与最近X次密码重复，可配置 -1，关闭校验.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.enable-additional-checks
properties.description: 登录认证是否扩展额外检查规则.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.hide-user-not-found-exceptions
properties.description: 是否隐藏用户找不到异常.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.access-token-duration
properties.description: 访问令牌有效时间，单位为秒，默认值 30 分钟.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.refresh-token-duration
properties.description: 刷新令牌有效时间，单位为秒，通常为访问令牌有效时间的两倍.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.allowed-renew-token
properties.description: 是否允许续签，默认不允许.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.refresh-min-duration
properties.description: 续签判定阙值，单位为秒，当访问令牌剩余时间小于该值时，可进行续签操作.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.max-version
properties.description: 最大续签次数，默认 5 次.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.algorithm
properties.description: JWT 签名算法 {@link com.nimbusds.jose.JWSAlgorithm}，默认为 RS256.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.cert-info.alias
properties.description: 证书名称.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.cert-info.key-password
properties.description: 证书密钥.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.cert-info.cert-location
properties.description: 证书路径.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.claims.issuer
properties.description: JWT 发布者的 URL 地址.

properties.name: zblog.base.security.jwt.claims.subject
properties.description: JWT 面向的用户.

properties.name: zblog.base.log.control.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable request and response logging. Default is false (logging disabled).

properties.name: zblog.base.log.control.model
properties.description: The control log model.

properties.name: zblog.base.log.control.paths
properties.description: List of paths for which logging should be enabled/disabled.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.model
properties.description: 文件上传模式，对应 FileHandlerEnum.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.local.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用本地文件存储.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.local.file-access-url
properties.description: 本地文件访问 URL 前缀，用于拼接文件对外访问地址.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.local.storage-path-prefix
properties.description: 本地文件存储路径前缀（逻辑路径）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用阿里云 OSS 文件存储.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.file-access-url
properties.description: 阿里云 OSS 文件访问 URL 前缀.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.storage-path-prefix
properties.description: 阿里云 OSS 文件存储路径前缀（逻辑路径）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.access-key
properties.description: 阿里云 AccessKey ID.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.secret-key
properties.description: 阿里云 AccessKey Secret.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.endpoint
properties.description: 阿里云 OSS Endpoint.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.oss.bucket-name
properties.description: 阿里云 OSS 存储桶名称.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用七牛云对象存储 Kodo.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.file-access-url
properties.description: 七牛云 Kodo 文件访问 URL（空间绑定域名）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.storage-path-prefix
properties.description: 七牛云 Kodo 文件存储路径前缀（逻辑路径）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.access-key
properties.description: 七牛云 AccessKey（AK）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.secret-key
properties.description: 七牛云 SecretKey（SK）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.zone
properties.description: 七牛云存储区域标识.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.kodo.zone-name
properties.description: 七牛云存储空间名称（Bucket）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用腾讯云 COS 对象存储.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.file-access-url
properties.description: 腾讯云 COS 文件访问 URL 前缀.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.storage-path-prefix
properties.description: 腾讯云 COS 文件存储路径前缀（逻辑路径）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.access-key
properties.description: 腾讯云访问密钥 ID.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.secret-key
properties.description: 腾讯云访问密钥 SecretKey.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.region
properties.description: 腾讯云 COS 所在地域（Region）.

properties.name: zblog.base.file.cos.bucket-name
properties.description: 腾讯云 COS 存储桶名称.

values.description: zblog.base.log.control.paths 为允许记录日志的路径列表.
zblog.base.log.control.paths 为禁止记录日志的路径列表.
